description: This method gets a data manager job given the jobId.

job_id.description: The job id of the job queried.

job_definition_name.description: The name of the job definition of the job.

data_service_name.description: The name of the data service of the job definition.

starttime.description: Time at which the job was started in UTC ISO 8601 format.

data_manager_name.description: The name of the DataManager Resource within the specified resource group. DataManager names must be between 3 and 24 characters in length and use any alphanumeric and underscore only

error.description: Top level error for the job.

endtime.description: Time at which the job ended in UTC ISO 8601 format.
